author: Josh
install_msg: Thanks for installing Dank Hall! Use `[p]dankhall settings` to get started with configuration.
name: DankHall
short: Hall of Fame system for Discord messages
description: A comprehensive Hall of Fame system that tracks and celebrates the dankest messages in your server. Features include reaction-based certification, customizable thresholds per channel, blacklisting, detailed statistics, leaderboards, and manual certification options.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores message IDs, user IDs, channel IDs, and guild IDs for certified messages. This data is used for statistics and preventing duplicate certifications.
